Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Establishes the New York state park police
Summary: Establishes the New York state park police under the jurisdiction of the commissioner of parks, recreation and historic preservation.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง13.17, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to establishing the New York state park police
